steps.title: Add 2 circles below for the bus tires.
steps.content: Add 2 circles below for the bus tires. Next, add small rectangular shapes inside the big rectangle as windows. Place them on the upper area.

steps.title: Make a straight outline on your sketches.
steps.content: Make a straight outline on your sketches. Erase the guidelines.

steps.title: Color it.
steps.content: Color it. Pick a different color for the window.

steps.title: Add small details.
steps.content: Add small details. Add lines for the bus light and door lock, depending on your preferences.
